channel.title: My big bazar
channel.description: Recent content on My big bazar

item.title: Shader adventures
item.description:
I realized I’m pretty fascinated by shaders, yet I’d never actually taken the time to understand them. This little page exists to fix that.

Most of what you’ll find here will connect closely with my Game Adventures page, so make sure to check that out too!

item.title: Reading Kierkegaard: The Sickness Unto Death
item.description:
This page gathers my thoughts while I’m reading Søren Kierkegaard’s essay The Sickness Unto Death, chapter by chapter.
I hope you enjoy it as much as I do !

item.title: Hello
item.description:
Welcome to the first page of this blog.
Starting feels a little odd—quiet, almost like walking into an empty room and beginning to speak.

This post is mostly here for the record. There may not be much yet… but maybe that’s the point.
To myself in five years: hi :D
